title: Will work relentlessly to make India green mobility destination, says Amitabh Kant
description: The government is committed to promoting green mobility in India through various policy measures, including low taxes on electric vehicles and incentives for battery manufacturing. G20 Sherpa Amitabh Kant emphasized the importance of this shift at a Mercedes-Benz event, highlighting upcoming tenders for electric buses to reduce costs and enhance sustainability.
